data.actual_result: The String gets wrapped only if it is touching the right edge of the X button, making the text overlap it if long enough
data.expected_result: The String gets wrapped before the closing X button
data.short_description: Long enough Server Names in the "Invite Friends to..." Modal overlaps with the Close Button
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Server with a long name - Right Click the Server Icon and "Invite People" - In the "Invite Friends to..." Modal, observe
